players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I find it strange that Diana was the one who was found dead during the night. Let's keep a close eye on Charlie, as he didn't say anything in our discussion last night."

You: "I think we should be careful about jumping to conclusions about Charlie just because he stayed quiet. Sometimes people need time to process what happened. We should look at all the evidence before making accusations."
Charlie: "I believe it's important for us to work together as a team and consider all possibilities. Let's focus on gathering more information before making any accusations."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Bob
